name: Halloween Massacre
description:
Story Our character, who has been tortured in hell for centuries, escaped from hell the night before the witch's feast and will strike fear into the first town he sees. He will absorb the souls that succumb to their fears and restore their strength. Controls W-A-S-D: Move Left Click: Throwing Ghost Orb E: Absorb Soul F: Taunt LSHIFT: Run Software Developer-Polat Efe KAYA Art Designer-Kaan Mert CİKSE
